name: TokoToko
storyline: Hako is a young beginner artist. She is full of life and glee. To make her dreams come true, she has to stage a great show. Dazzled by your talent, she asks for your help to gather a troupe of Tokotokos to play in her show. This is really important for Hako: her fate as an artist depends on it!
summary: Solve riddles by drawing on real paper and help Hako find the other Tokotokos in a cute and fun story – all this through augmented reality. Help Hako in becoming an artist. Tokotokos are creatures from another realm where every individual is encouraged in becoming artists in their own way. Some like painting, others prefer writing poetry or playing music. They are cute but like all artists, they have personality! However, if you become their friend, they will never let you down.
